name: OpenInt
headline: Open Source Embedded Product Integrations
description: OpenInt helps teams ship product integrations in hours, not weeks, using no or low code. Read and write data using unified APIs or sync it straight to your database.

founders.name: Amadeo Pellicce, Founder
founders.description:
Amadeo is the CEO & Founder of OpenInt (W23). 

He has an MS in Computer Science. In 2013, he co-founded the UK’s first professional crypto exchange, Coinfloor (which was acquired). Subsequently, he led multiple product areas at Blockchain.com. Outside of work, Amadeo enjoys windsports and long-distance running.

# Pay by Connector. Never By Users.
All the data runs through your own Cloudflare account, so just pay by connectors used.
Business$350
Per active connector per month.
  * Unlimited Connections & Users
  * Magic Links & Embed SDK
  * Configuration Console Access
  * Managed Cloudflare Deploys
  * Healthchecks & Error Logs
  * Slack Channel Support

Get Started

  * Role Based Access Control & SSO

  * Pipeline Alerts & Live Debugger

generated_description:
**OpenInt: Accelerating Embedded Product Integrations**

Founded in 2022 and a proud member of Y Combinator Batch W23, OpenInt is transforming how teams approach product integrations. Their mission is simple yet powerful: to provide open source embedded product integrations that allow teams to ship integrations in mere hours—rather than weeks—using little to no code.

### What They Do

OpenInt excels in connecting applications seamlessly through unified APIs. Teams can effortlessly read and write data or synchronize directly with their databases. The platform supports over 3,100 integrations, making it possible to connect your app to a vast universe of services. 

#### Key Features:
- **Speedy Integration**: Users can configure integrations and launch them directly to their applications, making them instantly usable by customers.
- **Flexible Payment Model**: OpenInt charges based on the connectors used rather than users, promoting a scalable pricing model that benefits growing businesses.
- **Robust Support and Documentation**: Comprehensive documentation and dedicated support options ensure that developers have the resources they need.

Their business plan starts at $350 per month per active connector with unlimited connections and users, and they offer a custom enterprise plan for organizations with complex needs.

### The Team

OpenInt operates with a lean team of four, under the guidance of notable Group Partner Brad Flora. Their collective expertise drives the innovation behind the platform and helps maintain a user-focused approach.

### Tech Stack and Target Market

OpenInt positions itself in the developer tools and SaaS space, leveraging open-source technology and AI to empower developers. Their tagline speaks to the core of their vision: giving SaaS developers an edge through deep product integrations.

### Why OpenInt?

In a world where speed and efficiency are paramount, OpenInt stands out by breaking down the barriers to integration and providing a user-friendly solution for developers. For those looking to streamline their product's connectivity, OpenInt is a forward-thinking solution that simplifies complex processes.

To learn more or get started, visit their official website at [OpenInt](https://openint.dev).
